Title: Authorizes Powell House, in the village of Farmingdale, county of Nassau, to apply for a retroactive property tax exemption
Summary: Authorizes Powell House, in the village of Farmingdale, county of Nassau, to apply for and receive a retroactive property tax exemption with respect to the 2024-2025 school tax assessment rolls and the 2025 general tax assessment roll.
ActClause: AN ACT authorizing the county of Nassau assessor to accept an application for a real property tax exemption from Powell House
